channel.title: Help me please [742 Server]
channel.description:
I am REALLY NEW to coding/programming or whatever it's called. I am VERY NOOBY. My cousin and I have been wanting to make a server for some time now, and I have finally made one (a 508), but we wanted more. Like Nex, Corporal Beast, etc. So, I downloaded a 742 cache, Interception by Tehpk source, and a Matrix Client.
I am having trouble with the Source. I had to edit the compiler a bit, and now it works. But, the "run" is completely new to me. This is what the "run" had in it:
@echo off @title RUN MATRIX java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause
At first, I tried running it by itself, and it said "java" wasn't a recognizable batch file, or something like that. I copied and pasted the java.exe into the folder. It gave me another error:
[code=java][Launcher] Loading Cache... Exception in thread "main" java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\cache\main_file_c ache.dat2 (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:34) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:28) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:24) at com.rs.cache.Cache.init(Cache.java:20) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:57) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I don't know what this means. I've been stuck on this for a while (like I said, I'm a noob) and don't know what to do. Please, help me. Thank you all for whoever responds to this, it is greatly appreciated. :)

item.title: Help me please [742 Server]
item.dc:creator: @DigitalHater DigitalHater
item.description:
@DigitalHater wrote:

Pkor159:

Very nooby people start with 317 not 742…

I started with a 508, and it was kinda easy. It had more stuff. : / I didn’t want to start at that version of RuneScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please [742 Server]
item.dc:creator: @DigitalHater DigitalHater
item.description:
@DigitalHater wrote:

I am REALLY NEW to coding/programming or whatever it’s called. I am VERY NOOBY. My cousin and I have been wanting to make a server for some time now, and I have finally made one (a 508), but we wanted more. Like Nex, Corporal Beast, etc. So, I downloaded a 742 cache, Interception by Tehpk source, and a Matrix Client.

I am having trouble with the Source. I had to edit the compiler a bit, and now it works. But, the “run” is completely new to me. This is what the “run” had in it:

@echo off
@title RUN MATRIX
java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true
pause

At first, I tried running it by itself, and it said “java” wasn’t a recognizable batch file, or something like that. I copied and pasted the java.exe into the folder. It gave me another error:

[Launcher] Loading Cache... Exception in thread "main" java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\cache\main_file_c ache.dat2 (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:34) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:28) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:24) at com.rs.cache.Cache.init(Cache.java:20) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:57) Press any key to continue . . .

I don’t know what this means. I’ve been stuck on this for a while (like I said, I’m a noob) and don’t know what to do. Please, help me. Thank you all for whoever responds to this, it is greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
